verses.text: If \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H4191"\w* \w shall|strong="H1818"\w* steal \w an|strong="H5221"\w* ox, \w or|strong="H4191"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sheep, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w it|strong="H5221"\w*, \w or|strong="H4191"\w* sell \w it|strong="H5221"\w*; \w he|strong="H5221"\w* \w shall|strong="H1818"\w* pay five oxen \w for|strong="H4191"\w* \w an|strong="H5221"\w* ox, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* four sheep \w for|strong="H4191"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sheep.

If \w the|strong="H5921"\w* thief \w be|strong="H8121"\w* found breaking \w in|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w be|strong="H8121"\w* smitten \w that|strong="H1818"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* die, there \w shall|strong="H1818"\w* \w be|strong="H8121"\w* no \w bloodguiltiness|strong="H1818"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

If \w the|strong="H5704"\w* sun \w be|strong="H3027"\w* risen \w upon|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w*, \w there|strong="H4672"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* bloodguiltiness \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w*: \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w should|strong="H7999"\w* \w make|strong="H7999"\w* \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w*; if \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* nothing, then \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* sold \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w theft|strong="H1591"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* theft \w be|strong="H3588"\w* found \w in|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* hand alive, whether \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* ox, \w or|strong="H7704"\w* ass, \w or|strong="H7704"\w* sheep; \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H7704"\w* \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* double.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w shall|strong="H7704"\w* \w cause|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w or|strong="H7704"\w* vineyard \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w be|strong="H3318"\w* \w eaten|strong="H1197"\w*, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w shall|strong="H7704"\w* let \w his|strong="H3588"\w* beast loose, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w feed|strong="H1197"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* another man’s \w field|strong="H7704"\w*; \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* best \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* own \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* best \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* own vineyard, \w shall|strong="H7704"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H7999"\w* \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* fire break \w out|strong="H4672"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w catch|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* thorns, \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* shocks \w of|strong="H1004"\w* corn, \w or|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w standing|strong="H7453"\w* corn, \w or|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* field, \w be|strong="H5414"\w* consumed; \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* kindled \w the|strong="H3588"\w* fire \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w*.

If \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1167"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w deliver|strong="H4672"\w* \w unto|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w* money \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w stuff|strong="H4399"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w keep|strong="H7126"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* stolen \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w man|strong="H1167"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; if \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w thief|strong="H1590"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w*, \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* pay double.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* thief \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* found, \w then|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* master \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* house \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* come \w near|strong="H5921"\w* \w unto|strong="H1697"\w* \w God|strong="H7999"\w*, \add to see \add*whether \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w put|strong="H8147"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* hand \w unto|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*’s goods.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* matter \w of|strong="H3605"\w* trespass, \w whether|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* raiment, \add or \add*\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w manner|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* lost \w thing|strong="H3588"\w*, whereof \w one|strong="H3605"\w* saith, \w This|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cause|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w both|strong="H3605"\w* parties \w shall|strong="H7794"\w* come \w before|strong="H7200"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*; \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w whom|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H7794"\w* condemn \w shall|strong="H7794"\w* \w pay|strong="H5414"\w* double \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*.

\w If|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1167"\w* \w deliver|strong="H7971"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* ass, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* ox, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sheep, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H1961"\w* beast, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H1961"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* die, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* hurt, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* driven \w away|strong="H7971"\w*, \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H1167"\w* seeing \w it|strong="H1961"\w*:

\w the|strong="H5973"\w* oath \w of|strong="H1167"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H1167"\w* be \w between|strong="H5973"\w* them both, whether he \w hath|strong="H1167"\w* not put \w his|strong="H5973"\w* hand \w unto|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H5973"\w* neighbour’s goods; \w and|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w owner|strong="H1167"\w* \w thereof|strong="H1167"\w* \w shall|strong="H1167"\w* accept \w it|strong="H7999"\w*, \w and|strong="H5973"\w* he \w shall|strong="H1167"\w* not \w make|strong="H7999"\w* \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* if \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* stolen \w from|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H7999"\w*, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H7999"\w* \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w* \w unto|strong="H7999"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* owner thereof.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w torn|strong="H7665"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w pieces|strong="H7665"\w*, let \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w bring|strong="H4191"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* witness; \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H7453"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H7999"\w* \w good|strong="H7999"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w which|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H7592"\w* \w torn|strong="H7665"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5973"\w* \w if|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H7916"\w* borrow aught \w of|strong="H1167"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* neighbour, \w and|strong="H5973"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* hurt, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* die, \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w owner|strong="H1167"\w* \w thereof|strong="H1167"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* being \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w surely|strong="H7999"\w* \w make|strong="H7999"\w* \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* owner thereof \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H7901"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* good: \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* hired \w thing|strong="H3588"\w*, \w it|strong="H3588"\w* came \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w its|strong="H3588"\w* hire.

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* if \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man entice \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H3701"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* betrothed, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w lie|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H3701"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w*, \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H3701"\w* \w surely|strong="H5414"\w* \w pay|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dowry|strong="H4119"\w* \w for|strong="H3701"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* wife.

If her father utterly \w refuse|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H2421"\w* \w give|strong="H2421"\w* her unto \w him|strong="H2421"\w*, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* pay money according \w to|strong="H2421"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* dowry \w of|strong="H3808"\w* virgins.
Thou shalt \w not|strong="H4191"\w* suffer \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sorceress \w to|strong="H4191"\w* live.
Whosoever lieth \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* beast \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* surely \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* death.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* sacrificeth \w unto|strong="H4714"\w* \w any|strong="H1961"\w* \w god|strong="H3808"\w*, save \w unto|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w*, \w shall|strong="H4714"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* utterly destroyed.

\w And|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stranger shalt thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* wrong, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w oppress|strong="H6031"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*: \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w ye|strong="H3808"\w* \w were|strong="H3605"\w* strangers \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3605"\w* Egypt.
\w Ye|strong="H8085"\w* \w shall|strong="H8085"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* \w any|strong="H3588"\w* widow, \w or|strong="H8085"\w* fatherless child.

\w If|strong="H1961"\w* \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* afflict \w them|strong="H2026"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w any|strong="H1961"\w* wise, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H2719"\w* cry \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H2026"\w* \w unto|strong="H1121"\w* \w me|strong="H2026"\w*, \w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w surely|strong="H1961"\w* hear \w their|strong="H1961"\w* cry;

\w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* wrath \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* wax hot, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* kill \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sword; \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* wives \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w widows|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* children fatherless.

If \w thou|strong="H5704"\w* lend money \w to|strong="H5704"\w* any \w of|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* people \w with|strong="H7725"\w* \w thee|strong="H7725"\w* \w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H8121"\w* poor, \w thou|strong="H5704"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H8121"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* creditor; neither \w shall|strong="H7453"\w* \w ye|strong="H7725"\w* lay upon \w him|strong="H7725"\w* usury.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H7901"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* \w thy|strong="H8085"\w* neighbour’s \w garment|strong="H8071"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* pledge, \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* shalt restore \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w unto|strong="H8085"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w* \w by|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* sun goeth \w down|strong="H7901"\w*:

\w for|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w is|strong="H5971"\w* \w his|strong="H7043"\w* only covering, \w it|strong="H7043"\w* \w is|strong="H5971"\w* \w his|strong="H7043"\w* garment \w for|strong="H5971"\w* \w his|strong="H7043"\w* skin: wherein \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* sleep? \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w it|strong="H7043"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w come|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w pass|strong="H5971"\w*, when \w he|strong="H3808"\w* crieth \w unto|strong="H5971"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* hear; \w for|strong="H5971"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am gracious.

\w Thou|strong="H5414"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* revile \w God|strong="H5414"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* curse \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ruler \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w thy|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Thou|strong="H6213"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H6213"\w* delay \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* abundance \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w thy|strong="H5414"\w* fruits, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w thy|strong="H5414"\w* liquors. \w The|strong="H5414"\w* firstborn \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w thy|strong="H5414"\w* sons shalt \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*.

Likewise shalt \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* do \w with|strong="H1320"\w* thine oxen, \add and \add*\w with|strong="H1320"\w* \w thy|strong="H7993"\w* sheep: seven days \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H7704"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H1320"\w* \w its|strong="H1961"\w* dam; \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* eighth \w day|strong="H6944"\w* \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* shalt \w give|strong="H7704"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H7993"\w*.
And ye shall be holy men unto me: therefore ye shall not eat any flesh that is torn of beasts in the field; ye shall cast it to the dogs.
